author: Mat Smith
title: The Morning After: Is ‘Halo: Infinite’ worth the wait?
description: The wait is finally over. After a year-long delay, Xbox’s iconic hero, Master Chief, is back. With Halo Infinite, there are new toys and fight mechanics, while many players will also benefit from major cosmetic upgrades if they’re playing on the newest Micros…
